Posts.Content:
Hi,
Wanted to see if anyone has had a similar experience, and what was their outcome with the physician. I'm not a worrier, I do not trust doctors and feel knowledge is power. I'm 39 years old. Your comments are very much appreciated !
~~~ Mammogram ~~~~~
*I had a routine mamo and found 1 simple cyst in 2007 rated BI-RAD-2. Not a big deal.
*Found a lump this year (2011) & did mamo along with ultrasound. New findings rated BI-RADS-3.
* Told to come back in 6 months for "ultrasound only" for the following* :
1.) - Cyst lesion manifest (trilobed anechoic to a slightly hypoechoic lesion)
2.) -Few course calcifications diffusely scattered bilaterally
3.)- Numerous complicated cyst
4.)- Check on suspicious lymph node 
~~ My negative feeling towards trusting doctors started with~ :
I was misdiagnosed for 4 years with FOUR different doctors that blew off a mark on my skin never went away nor healed. Went with my gut as something told me this didn't look normal. Diagnosed with Squamous Cell Carcinoma skin cancer last year.
*** FYI- This type of skin cancer can also spread to lymph nodes & the suspicious lymph node from mamo is in the same area of the skin cancer.
I would love to hear anyones advice or what they have experienced that is similar. I want to know what to look for and ask with my next test coming up.
Thanks a bunch !
Posts.Title: Could I Have Breast or Lymph Node Cancer?
